sense.def: Alternative Names mu sui 目 㞎 .

Illness Sign identical with xie shi 斜視 , squint. Lei gong pao zhi lun 雷公炮炙論 Xu 序：目辟眼 㞎 ，有五花而 自正，五加皮是也。其葉有雄雌，三葉為雄，五葉為雌，須使五葉者， 作末酒浸飲之，其目喎者正 , “ ‘When the eyes squint , an application of the ‘five[-leaves] flower will cause them to return to straight [vision]’, is a reference to wu jia pi . From its leaves [one can distinguish] male and female variants. [Those with] three leaves are male, [those with] five leaves are female. One must use those with five leaves to prepare a powder and ingest it soaked in wine. Awry eyes will be corrected”.
